meanings.definition: A person who advocates or supports voluntary action or organization.
meanings.sent1: The voluntarists in our community always lend a helping hand.
meanings.sent2: Many voluntarists volunteer at the local shelter every weekend.
meanings.sent3: The voluntarists organized a bake sale to raise funds for charity.
meanings.sent4: She is a true voluntarist, always ready to pitch in and help others.
meanings.sent5: The voluntarists' dedication to serving others is truly inspiring.

meanings.definition: Belonging to or characteristic of voluntarism.
meanings.sent1: Her voluntarists beliefs guide her actions towards helping those in need.
meanings.sent2: The voluntarists approach to community service is admirable.
meanings.sent3: His voluntarists spirit shines through in his selfless acts of kindness.
meanings.sent4: The voluntarists nature of the organization promotes a sense of unity.
meanings.sent5: The voluntarists philosophy emphasizes the importance of giving back.
